channel.title: Motivation on Cloud Nine
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on Cloud Nine

item.title: Life Moves Habits Tell You Where
item.description: Life Moves Habits Tell You Where. Habits can be bad, like when they deter progress toward your current set of goals, and they can be good, like when they move you closer to your goals or align you with them (if, for example, your goal is to attain a certain state of being). Habits include things like the way you spend your time, the way you think about things, and the way you communicate.

item.title: The Bean Machine
item.description: Staying Focused On Being Yourself Here is something to think about. What does it mean to be normal? The picture below is a picture of a bean machine, also known as a Quincunx, a Dalton Board, or Plinko. What happens to the ball when it gets dropped into the top of the bean machine? It gets bounced around right? Does the ball get to choose in which slot it will end up?
